name: Fists Of Carnage
description:
The famous leader along with his chaos creating has taken over the nuclear lab of your city & is threatening to destroy the world in order to introduce a new system where he controls everything. You along with your friend can only save the world now by fighting these evil beasts.

Put an end to the foolish plan of the gang by punching your way through the fighters. Combat in the streets to save the world from evil gangster fighters.
